Create a nginx pod calledÂ nginx-resolverÂ using imageÂ nginx, expose it internally with a service calledÂ nginx-resolver-service.

Test that you are able to look up the service and pod names from within the cluster. Use the imageÂ busybox:1.28Â to create a pod for dns lookup. Record results inÂ /root/CKA/nginx.svcÂ andÂ /root/CKA/nginx.podÂ for service and pod name resolutions respectively
